snippet.title: Monster Menu: The Scavenger's Cookbook - System Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5)
snippet.description:
Learn more @ https://nisamerica.com/monster-menu/

After setting off to explore a nearby dungeon, you soon find yourself hoplessly lost inside its walls. With no supplies, you must find a way to stay alive until you can escape.

Monster Menu: The Scavenger's Cookbook offers a heaping helping of mechanics to help you survive your dungeon-crawling adventures! Scavenge for materials and ingredients, fight off hordes of monsters, and cook up dishes to boost your stats and keep you moving forward!

Coming to Nintendo Switch, PS4, and PS5 on May 23, 2023!

#MonsterMenu
